record.title: COMMITTEE ON FINANCE RULES OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, pursuant to rule XXVI, paragraph 2, of the Standing Rules of the Senate, I submit for publication in the Congressional Record the rules of the Committee on Finance for the 110th Congress, adopted by the committee on January 17, 2007. I ask unanimous consent that the rules be printed.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the material was ordered to be printed in the RECORD, as follows:
